Posts.Content: Nov 30, 2007 07:21AM rmrm10 wrote: I am 36 yrs old was diagnosed with breast cancer Nov.20th. I have to go today for a pet scan and am nervous.. can anyone tell me if the dye mix had any side effects?
Posts.Title: After all surgery and treatment sarahb iodine

Posts.Content: Dec 2, 2007 06:41AM rmrm10 wrote: I have been up since 1 a.m.. lack of sleep since the C word has been a new thing around here. As I sit here ..I think, I dont want this! I Have things to do and people to see and places to go! Im angry and I hate it, all of it! And sadly it has just begun!! Surgery is scheduled for Dec 10th, Merry Freakin Christmas to me! I know there are alot who have it worse, and Im on a terrible self pity trip... I hope it goes away with the cancer!
Posts.Title: After all surgery and treatment sarahb iodine

Posts.Content: Dec 3, 2007 07:12AM rmrm10 wrote: Kathy, Thank you so much for letting me know its ok to feel the way I do. Im trying hard to be very positive and strong for my family, I dont let them see this side of me. I hope all is turning out well for you, and your prayers are greatly appreciated!!!
Posts.Title: After all surgery and treatment sarahb iodine

Posts.Content: Nov 30, 2007 07:28AM rmrm10 wrote: HI, I can say I know how you feel. I was diagnosed Nov 20th.. and when I got the call, i guess deep inside I already knew. I havent really cried yet, or gottem hysterical.. But I seem to be waiting for it to happen. You know what? maybe it wont! Maybe we are dealing with it better than we could have hoped for and there wont be a total breakdown.. at least thats what i keep telling myself.
